org.openscience.smsd.algorithm.vflib
Class BaseMCS

java.lang.Object
  org.openscience.smsd.helper.MoleculeInitializer
      org.openscience.smsd.algorithm.vflib.BaseMCS
Direct Known Subclasses:
VF2MCS
public class BaseMCS
extends MoleculeInitializer

This class should be used to find MCS between source graph and target graph. First the algorithm runs VF lib org.openscience.cdk.smsd.algorithm.vflib.map.VFMCSMapper and reports MCS between run source and target graphs. Then these solutions are extended using McGregor org.openscience.cdk.smsd.algorithm.mcgregor.McGregor algorithm where ever required.

Author:
Syed Asad Rahman
